code: import axios from"axios";var URL='https://servertool.herokuapp.com';export var GET=function GET(url){return axios.get(URL+url).then(function(e){return e.data;});};export var POST=function POST(url,value){return axios.post(URL+url,value).then(function(e){return e.data;});};export var POSTFILE=function POSTFILE(url,value){return axios.post(URL+url,value,{headers:{'Content-Type':'multipart/form-data'}});};
